sentences.english: A tiger ate a mother who was on her way home to her children.
sentences.korean: 호랑이는 아이들에게 집으로 돌아가던 엄마를 잡아먹었습니다.

sentences.english: The tiger went to the house disguised as the mother.
The brother and sister saw the tiger and climbed a tree for safety.
sentences.korean: 남매는 호랑이를 보고 안전을 위해 나무 위로 올라갔습니다.

sentences.english: They prayed to the heavens for a strong rope to escape.
sentences.korean: 그들은 탈출할 수 있도록 튼튼한 동아줄을 달라고 하늘에 기도했습니다.

sentences.english: A rope came down and they went up to the sky.
The tiger tried to follow but fell on a rotten rope.
sentences.korean: 호랑이는 따라가려 했지만 썩은 줄에서 떨어졌습니다.

sentences.english: The boy became the sun and the girl became the moon.
sentences.korean: 소년은 해가 되었고 소녀는 달이 되었습니다.
